mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Notan Studio
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Marshall University Archives and Special Collections
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Mrs. Baxter Alston, Sept. 6, 1944, black and white photograph. The name of this woman, the wife of Baxter Hall Alston, could not be identified. . Info on original sleeve reads: Baxter Alston, 9-6-44, back of image: Mrs. Baxter Alston, with Nortan Studio stamp.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: African Americans
Blacks
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mrs. Baxter Alston
